resources.string: "So people don't die here?"

Indeed, {playerName}. Sounds at first like one has arrived in paradise, does it not? It's the blue azoth - a power greater even than death.\n\nYou must still be wary, though. Some people die anyway, or worse.
"Where does Corruption come from?"
A mystery for the ages, to be sure. Some claim to have the answer, but I remain skeptical.\n\nDoes Corruption arise from the darkness within one's soul, or does it have a will and purpose of its own?
"You like living In Windsward?"

Oh, I suppose so. Sometimes, one just knows when they're in the right place.\n\nPerhaps it's the weather, a certain opportunity, or even the people. In my case, it's all of the above. I belong here, if that makes sense.
"Do I have to join a faction?"

I can understand your hesitation. The factions can sometimes be a headache here.\n\nBut I cannot dispute the fact that they have become extremely influential, both here in Windsward and all over Aeternum.
"I've talked to them. I'm ready to choose."
"Where should I go now?"
I hear they've got bounties on the Lost up in Brightwood. With your skillset, you could probably do quite well.\n\nI've always wanted to go south, and visit Cutlass Keys as well.
"Why should I buy a house?"

I'm happy here at the inn, but that's because it's cheap. If I could afford it, I'd buy a house.\n\nI'd furnish the place to my liking, and it would be nice to have a personal space to return to whenever I like.
"Why set up camp outside town?"

Why, there are many reasons. For starters, it's a place where you can rest and you can craft supplies.\n\nPerhaps more importantly, if you get yourself killed, it's a convenient place to be resurrected.
"Tell me about the Marauders."
We are the strongest of the strong. Where others hesitate, we charge headfirst into the fray.\n\nA Marauder is rewarded not only in gold, but in the glory of each victory.
"Tell me about the Syndicate."
We are the only ones here who have the acuity to unravel the mysteries of this place. We will learn the secrets of azoth and its power, and usher in a new era of prosperity for all.
"Tell me about the Covenant"

Aye, the Spark is what gives you life. It is the mover within ye. The purpose, the beliefs, that rise you from your bed every morn.\n\nThe Covenant are the stewards of the Spark, and of the poor souls who wander in darkness.
"Why did you give me this dye?"
Are you proud to be a member of the Maruders?\n\nThen show it off - dye your armor in the colors of our banner.
"Why did you give me this dye?"
You can turn your armor purple to match the Syndicate banner.\n\nRemind people who you are.
"Why did you give me this dye?"
It's golden dye for your armor and clothes. It shows your faith and allegiance to the Spark.
